name: Get That Thief Runner
storyline:
Meet the runner game were you can acutally finish! It's not infinity boring, it's fun! Run and avoid objects on your way and the city population too! Tap to jump and use scenario objects to get speed and catch that thief running at high speed to the finish line. Kids and adults will love it and best of all, it's free to play. It's a simple and a fun game and its also on cartoon style! Super cool! 
 
You'll love Get that Thief Runner because: 
 
★ Colorful 2d characters and beautiful environments 
★ Fun achievements to complete and release new levels 
★ A runner game that is not infinity, you will never get bored 
★ Fast levels, don't blink 
★ Five levels to unlock 
★ Easy to play, just tap the screen 
★ HD Graphics - High Definition 
★ Tablet and Smartphone compatible 
★ A kids game enjoyable for all ages 
 
Go Get That Thief now, before he gets to the finish line.
summary: Get That Thief is a runner game created not to be infinity based on repetitivity. Each stage has its defined finish line and the goal is to get the thief prior to it. If the player manages to get to the finish line even faster than the thief then there is a bonus for that. Each stage has its own theme and the cartoony graphics style makes the game pretty and colorful. The possibility of having different levels to discover engages the player to continue completing the funny achievements to unlock more content.
